===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|まぶた}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=まぶた|目|tr1=ma|t1=eye|pos1=ancient combining form of modern reading ''me''|蓋|tr2=futa|t2=lid}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>  {{rendaku2|sort=まぶた|futa|buta}}

{{ja-noun|まぶた}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=まぶた|anatomy}} [[eyelid]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=まぶた|figuratively}} [[memory]]

====Idioms====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{lang|ja|瞼}}{{l|ja|が}}{{l|ja|重い}} (''mabuta ga omoi''): “eyelids are heavy” → to be [[sleepy]]
* {{lang|ja|瞼}}{{l|ja|の}}{{l|ja|母}} (''mabuta no haha''): “eyelid mother, mother [in, behind] one's eyelids” → the [[memory]] of one's [[mother]]
* {{lang|ja|瞼}}{{l|ja|に}}{{l|ja|浮かぶ}} (''mabuta ni ukabu''): “to rise up [behind] one's eyelids” → to [[come to mind]]
* {{lang|ja|瞼}}{{l|ja|に}}{{l|ja|残る}} (''mabuta ni nokoru''): “to remain in one's eyelids” → to [[remain]] in [[memory]], to [[live on]] in one's [[mind]]
{{der-bottom}}
